qualities.name: Adept
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Enables Adept powers

qualities.name: Adrenaline Surge
qualities.effect: Allows the character to act first in the first Initiative Pass of a new combat regardless of their actual Initiative Score.

qualities.name: Ambidextrous
qualities.effect: The character does not suffer any modifiers for using an off-hand weapon.

qualities.name: Analytical Mind
qualities.effect: +2 Data Search; +2 Software

qualities.name: Animal Empathy
qualities.effect: +2 Animal Husbandry group

qualities.name: Aptitude
qualities.effect: Skill max +1 (selected skill)

qualities.name: Arcane Arrester
qualities.effect: Character treats Force-based spell effects against them at half their actual strength.

qualities.name: Astral Chameleon
qualities.effect: The character's astral signature blends quickly, lasting only half as long, and providing a -2 dice pool modifier to others attempting to assense it.

qualities.name: Astral Sight
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Banishing max -6; Binding max -6; Counterspelling max -6; Enchanting max -6; Ritual Spellcasting max -6; Spellcasting max -6; Summoning max -6

qualities.name: Authority
qualities.effect: Receives a +2 modifier on Spoof Command Tests and the modifier for hacking security or admin accounts is reduced by 2.

qualities.name: Balance Receptor
qualities.effect: Adds a +1 dice pool modifier to all tests involving balance.

qualities.name: Beak
qualities.effect: -10% Lifestyle cost

qualities.name: Bicardiac
qualities.effect: Character possesses a second heart, allowing them to take a maximum of 8 boxes of Stun or Fatigue damage instead of the usual 6.

qualities.name: Bilingual
qualities.effect: Allows the character to read, write, and speak a second language fluently, listing the second language as Native.

qualities.name: Biocompatability (Bioware)
qualities.effect: 90% Bioware Essence cost

qualities.name: Biocompatability (Cyberware)
qualities.effect: 90% Cyberware Essence cost

qualities.name: Biosonar
qualities.effect: Character possesses a sophisticated biological echolocation system similar to a bat's or dolphin's, functioning like the cyberware senses.

qualities.name: Black Market Pipeline
qualities.effect: Black market access

qualities.name: Blandness
qualities.effect: -1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Bone Spikes
qualities.effect: +2 Unarmed DV

qualities.name: Born Rich
qualities.effect: +60 max BP to Nuyen

qualities.name: Broad Auditory System (Infrasound)
qualities.effect: Enables the character to hear infrasonic sounds beyond the normal metahuman hearing range.

qualities.name: Broad Auditory System (Ultrasound)
qualities.effect: Enables the character to hear ultrasonic sounds beyond the normal metahuman hearing range.

qualities.name: Camouflage
qualities.effect: Character's skin pigmentation grants a dice pool modifier (up to +4) for Infiltration Tests in certain environments.

qualities.name: Catlike
qualities.effect: +1 Infiltration; +1 Shadowing

qualities.name: Celerity
qualities.effect: +50% Movement

qualities.name: Changeling (Class I SURGE)
qualities.effect: 10 free positive quality BP; -5 free negative quality BP

qualities.name: Changeling (Class II SURGE)
qualities.effect: 20 free positive quality BP; -10 free negative quality BP

qualities.name: Changeling (Class III SURGE)
qualities.effect: 30 free positive quality BP; -15 free negative quality BP

qualities.name: Chatty
qualities.effect: Gains a +2 dice pool modifier to Social Skill Tests when communicating via AR or VR.

qualities.name: Claws
qualities.effect: Character's fingernails/toenails harden into claws, allowing them to attack with Unarmed Combat skill, inflicting (STR/2)P damage.

qualities.name: Climate Adaptation (Arctic)
qualities.effect: Grants a +2 dice pool modifier for Survival Tests and resisting damage from extreme cold.

qualities.name: Climate Adaptation (Desert)
qualities.effect: Grants a +2 dice pool modifier for Survival Tests and resisting damage from extreme heat.

qualities.name: Code Flux
qualities.effect: AI's access code fluctuates semi-randomly when it moves between nodes, making it exceptionally difficult to track.

qualities.name: Code of Conduct: Mercenary Credo
qualities.effect: +2 Notoriety; +1 Composure; +1 Judge Intentions

qualities.name: Code of Conduct: Semper Paratis
qualities.effect: +2 Intimidation

qualities.name: Codeslinger
qualities.effect: Receives a +2 dice pool modifier to a specified Matrix action.

qualities.name: College Education
qualities.effect: +1 Academic skills

qualities.name: Common Sense
qualities.effect: Requires the gamemaster to warn the player when the character is about to do something foolish by acting as the character's inner voice of reason.

qualities.name: Corrosive Spit
qualities.effect: Character possesses glands that produce a highly corrosive mucus that can be spit as a ranged attack using Exotic Ranged Weapon skill.

qualities.name: Deep Cover (1 Trigger Known)
qualities.effect: Preserves the character's real personality while operating under a false identity. One trigger snaps them back to their true self.

qualities.name: Deep Cover (2 Triggers Known)
qualities.effect: Preserves the character's real personality while operating under a false identity. Two triggers snap them back to their true self.

qualities.name: Dermal Alteration (Bark Skin)
qualities.effect: Character possesses bark-like skin granting natural armor or resistance bonuses.

qualities.name: Dermal Alteration (Blubber)
qualities.effect: Character possesses a thick layer of blubber granting cold resistance.

qualities.name: Dermal Alteration (Dragon Skin)
qualities.effect: Character possesses scaled skin granting natural armor.

qualities.name: Dermal Alteration (Granite Shell)
qualities.effect: Character possesses rock-like skin granting significant natural armor.

qualities.name: Dermal Alteration (Rhino Hide)
qualities.effect: Character possesses thick, leathery skin granting natural armor.

qualities.name: Dermal Deposits
qualities.effect: Character possesses tough, sinewy deposits under the skin that count as 1 natural Ballistic/Impact Armor, cumulative with worn armor.

qualities.name: Designer
qualities.effect: AI grants an additional +2 modifier to the Response and Signal attributes of its home node.

qualities.name: Digital Doppelganger
qualities.effect: Causes the character's digital data trail to be attributed to someone else's identity, resulting in a +2 threshold for data searches or tracking the character on their current ID.

qualities.name: Dormant Metagenetics (Human)
qualities.effect: Character possesses unexpressed metagenetic predispositions that may be triggered by magic during play, causing them to transform into a changeling.

qualities.name: Dormant Metagenetics (Non-Human)
qualities.effect: Character possesses unexpressed metagenetic predispositions that may be triggered by magic during play, causing them to transform into a changeling.

qualities.name: Double Jointed
qualities.effect: +2 Escape Artist

qualities.name: Drake
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; Fly speed -2

qualities.name: Drone Pilot
qualities.effect: AI may 'jump into' drones and control them like a rigger, using its rating in place of Pilot and using drone autosofts.

qualities.name: Electrosense
qualities.effect: Character gains the capacity to sense electricity and changes to electric fields in the real world within (Essence) meters.

qualities.name: Elongated Limbs
qualities.effect: +1 Reach

qualities.name: Emulate
qualities.effect: AI is able to emulate programs it needs, using Rating + Software without causing Fading.

qualities.name: Erased (1 Week)
qualities.effect: The character's data trail and records vanish from all but the most secure systems within 1 week of being entered.

qualities.name: Erased (24 Hours)
qualities.effect: The character's data trail and records vanish from all but the most secure systems within 24 hours of being entered.

qualities.name: Escaped Clone
qualities.effect: Grants the character the ability to pass through security checks that rely on biometric data by cross-referencing with the original DNA donor.

qualities.name: Exceptional Attribute
qualities.effect: Attribute bonus (selected)

qualities.name: Fame (Local)
qualities.effect: Provides a +2 dice pool modifier to Social Skill Tests in appropriate situations where the character's public profile can be leveraged.

qualities.name: Fame (National)
qualities.effect: Provides a +4 dice pool modifier to Social Skill Tests in appropriate situations where the character's public profile can be leveraged.

qualities.name: Fame (Global)
qualities.effect: Provides a +6 dice pool modifier to Social Skill Tests in appropriate situations where the character's public profile can be leveraged.

qualities.name: Fangs
qualities.effect: Character's canine teeth are enlarged and sharpened, allowing them to attack with Unarmed Combat skill, suffering a -1 Reach penalty.

qualities.name: First Impression
qualities.effect: -1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Focused Concentration (Rating 1)
qualities.effect: +1 Drain Resistance

qualities.name: Focused Concentration (Rating 2)
qualities.effect: +2 Drain Resistance

qualities.name: Functional Tail (Paddle)
qualities.effect: +2 Swimming; +50% Swim speed

qualities.name: Gearhead (Vehicle)
qualities.effect: Grants a +1 dice pool bonus to all Piloting Tests for a specific vehicle type.

qualities.name: Gearhead (Category)
qualities.effect: Grants a +2 dice pool bonus to all Piloting Tests for a category of vehicles.

qualities.name: Genecrafted
qualities.effect: 80% Genetech cost

qualities.name: Genetic Heritage
qualities.effect: The character can start play with one free genetic modification and has a 20 percent cost reduction on transgenic genetic enhancements.

qualities.name: Gills
qualities.effect: Character possesses amphibian-like gills on the sides of the neck, allowing them to breathe underwater.

qualities.name: Glamour
qualities.effect: +3 Social Active skills

qualities.name: Greasy Skin
qualities.effect: Character's skin produces a lubricant in stressful situations, granting a -2 dice modifier against grappling attempts if mostly unclothed.

qualities.name: Goring Horns
qualities.effect: Character possesses horns that can be used in combat with the Exotic Melee Weapon: Horns skill, inflicting (STR/2+1)P damage.

qualities.name: Guts
qualities.effect: Receives a +2 dice pool modifier on tests made to resist fear and intimidation.

qualities.name: Hawk Eye
qualities.effect: Grants a +1 dice pool modifier to Perception Tests to spot something at a distance and reduces unaugmented Weapon Range Modifiers by one level.

qualities.name: High Pain Tolerance (Rating 1)
qualities.effect: Can ignore 1 box of damage when calculating wound modifiers.

qualities.name: High Pain Tolerance (Rating 2)
qualities.effect: Can ignore 2 boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers.

qualities.name: High Pain Tolerance (Rating 3)
qualities.effect: Can ignore 3 boxes of damage when calculating wound modifiers.

qualities.name: Home Ground
qualities.effect: Provides a +2 dice pool modifier for all Active Skill Tests and a +4 modifier for relevant Knowledge skills within the character's home turf.

qualities.name: Human-Looking
qualities.effect: A metahuman character can 'pass' for human in most circumstances, receiving neutral attitudes from human NPCs in Social Skill Tests.

qualities.name: Inspired
qualities.effect: +2 Artisan

qualities.name: Infected: Bandersnatch
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; -2 CHA; -1 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS

qualities.name: Infected: Banshee
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +1 INT; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; +1 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Dzoo-Noo-Qua
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +2 BOD; +2 REA; +1 STR; -1 CHA; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; +2 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Fom√≥raig
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +3 BOD; +1 REA; +3 STR; -2 CHA; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; +1 Initiative

qualities.name: Infected: Ghoul
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +4 BOD; +2 REA; +3 STR; -2 CHA; -1 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS; +2 Initiative

qualities.name: Infected: Goblin
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +1 BOD; +1 REA; +1 STR; -2 CHA; -2 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS; +1 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Loup-Garou
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +1 BOD; +4 STR; -2 CHA; -1 LOG; -1 WIL; -1 ESS

qualities.name: Infected: Nosferatu
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +1 BOD; +1 AGI; +1 REA; +1 STR; +2 CHA; +2 INT; +2 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS; +3 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Vampire
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +2 AGI; +2 REA; +2 CHA; +1 INT; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; -4 Swimming; +3 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Wendigo
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; -1 AGI; +1 CHA; -1 ESS; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Abat
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +2 AGI; +2 REA; +2 CHA; +1 INT; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; -4 Swimming; +3 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Amalanhig
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +2 AGI; +2 REA; +2 CHA; +1 INT; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; -4 Swimming; +3 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Busaw
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +4 BOD; +2 REA; +3 STR; -2 CHA; -1 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS; +2 Initiative

qualities.name: Infected: Gaki
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +4 BOD; +2 REA; +3 STR; -2 CHA; -1 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS; +2 Initiative

qualities.name: Infected: Penanggalan
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +2 AGI; +2 REA; +2 CHA; +1 INT; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; -4 Swimming; +3 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Infected: Sasobonsam
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +4 BOD; +2 REA; +3 STR; -2 CHA; -1 LOG; +2 WIL; -1 ESS; +2 Initiative; +1 Reach

qualities.name: Infected: Sukuyan
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Grants critter powers; +2 AGI; +2 REA; +2 CHA; +1 INT; +1 WIL; -1 ESS; +3 Initiative; +1 Initiative Pass

qualities.name: Juryrigger
qualities.effect: Allows the character to perform temporary, complicated technical feats with bare minimum materials, contingent on a successful Mechanics Skill Test.

qualities.name: Keen-Eared
qualities.effect: Grants a +1 die bonus to hearing-based Perception Tests, but risks penalties from sound distraction.

qualities.name: Larger Tusks
qualities.effect: Allows an Unarmed Combat attack inflicting (STR/2+1)P damage due to enlarged incisor teeth.

qualities.name: Latent Awakening
qualities.effect: Allows a character to Awaken later in the game, gaining a Magic attribute of 1 and an appropriate magical quality for a Karma cost.

qualities.name: Linguist
qualities.effect: +2 Language skills

qualities.name: Lightning Reflexes
qualities.effect: +2 REA

qualities.name: Low-Light Vision
qualities.effect: Allows the character to see normally in light levels as low as starlight, negating penalties for low-light conditions.

qualities.name: Lucky
qualities.effect: +1 EDG; -1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Made Man
qualities.effect: Designates the character as a minor member of an organized crime syndicate, granting the syndicate as a free Group Contact with Connection 8 and Loyalty 4.

qualities.name: Magician
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Enables Spellcasting

qualities.name: Magnetosense
qualities.effect: Character has an innate magnetic compass that provides a constant reference to magnetic north, granting +2 to Navigation Tests.

qualities.name: Marsupial Pouch
qualities.effect: Character has an abdominal pouch capable of holding small items (up to 2 kg), granting +2 to Palming Tests for concealing items.

qualities.name: Metagenetic Improvement
qualities.effect: Attribute bonus (selected)

qualities.name: Mystic Adept
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute; Enables Spellcasting

qualities.name: Nasty Vibe
qualities.effect: +3 Intimidation

qualities.name: Natural Athlete
qualities.effect: +1 Running; +1 Gymnastics

qualities.name: Natural Venom
qualities.effect: Character can produce a natural venom (Power 6, Speed 1 Combat Turn, Vector: Injection) deliverable via bite, stinger, or spitting.

qualities.name: Night Vision
qualities.effect: Grants human characters the advantages of low-light vision, allowing them to see normally in dim environments.

qualities.name: Ogre Stomach
qualities.effect: -20% Lifestyle cost

qualities.name: Outdoorsman
qualities.effect: +1 Outdoors group

qualities.name: Perceptive (+1 Bonus)
qualities.effect: +1 Assensing; +1 Perception

qualities.name: Perceptive (+2 Bonus)
qualities.effect: +2 Assensing; +2 Perception

qualities.name: Perfect Time
qualities.effect: Allows the character to always know the current time, to the minute, due to a split-second sense of timing.

qualities.name: Photometabolism
qualities.effect: -10% Lifestyle cost

qualities.name: Privileged Family Name
qualities.effect: Makes the character's name recognizable and grants them a 'get out of jail free card' for small legal violations and misdemeanors in their home sprawl.

qualities.name: Proboscis
qualities.effect: Character has a retractable feeding tube that can drain blood, dealing 1 box of Stun damage per Combat Turn (resisted by BOD). Victim's blood provides 1 meal equivalent per box drained.

qualities.name: Restricted Gear (Rating 1)
qualities.effect: +1 Restricted item

qualities.name: Restricted Gear (Rating 2)
qualities.effect: +2 Restricted item

qualities.name: Restricted Gear (Rating 3)
qualities.effect: +3 Restricted item

qualities.name: Satyr Legs
qualities.effect: +2 Gymnastics; +50% Movement

qualities.name: School of Hard Knocks
qualities.effect: +1 Street skills

qualities.name: Sense of Direction
qualities.effect: Ensures the character always knows where true north lies and can always retrace his path if he possesses the Survival skill.

qualities.name: Sensei
qualities.effect: Designates one contact who can act as the character's Instructor for a specific skill group, allowing the character to gain instruction benefits without searching for a teacher.

qualities.name: Setae
qualities.effect: Character has microscopic hair-like structures on hands and feet enabling climbing on smooth vertical surfaces and ceilings at half walking speed. Grants +4 to Climbing Tests.

qualities.name: Shiva Arms
qualities.effect: Character has an extra pair of fully functional arms, allowing additional actions and +2 dice to grappling. Can be taken multiple times for additional pairs.

qualities.name: Speed Reading
qualities.effect: Allows the character to read a full page of written text (about 800 words) in about 5 seconds.

qualities.name: Spell Knack
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute

qualities.name: Spirit Knack
qualities.effect: Grants Magic attribute

qualities.name: Technical School Education
qualities.effect: +1 Professional skills

qualities.name: Technomancer
qualities.effect: Grants Resonance attribute; Enables Technomancer abilities

qualities.name: The Artisan's Way
qualities.effect: Grants a 25% discount on several key Technical/Vehicle powers, enhances item Attunement, and modifies Adept Centering for technical skills.

qualities.name: The Artist's Way
qualities.effect: Grants a 25% discount on powers enhancing artistic/social performance and perception, and enhances certain specialized perception metamagic techniques.

qualities.name: The Athlete's Way
qualities.effect: Grants a 25% discount on powers enhancing physical attributes, movement, and endurance, and improves Adept Centering and Infusion metamagic for physical skills.

qualities.name: The Burnout's Way (Bioware)
qualities.effect: 90% Bioware Essence cost

qualities.name: The Burnout's Way (Cyberware)
qualities.effect: 90% Cyberware Essence cost

qualities.name: The Invisible Way
qualities.effect: Grants 25% discount on powers enhancing stealth, agility, and disguise, and improves Masking and Flexible Signature metamagic techniques for subtlety.

qualities.name: The Magician's Way
qualities.effect: Allows Mystic Adepts to specialize by gaining discounted powers from another Way, plus enhancement to either chosen metamagics or Centering for Sorcery.

qualities.name: The Speaker's Way
qualities.effect: Grants 25% discount on powers enhancing social interaction, empathy, and influence, and improves Flexible Signature and Cognition metamagical techniques.

qualities.name: The Totem's Way
qualities.effect: Allows specialization based on Mentor Spirit, grants discounted powers related to senses/animals, and improves Attunement (Animal) and Empower Animal metamagics.

qualities.name: The Warrior's Way
qualities.effect: Grants a 25% discount on powers enhancing combat speed, defense, and damage, and improves Adept Centering and weapon Attunement metamagic for combat skills.

qualities.name: Thermal Sensitivity
qualities.effect: Grants infrared-sensitive receptors allowing the character to perceive radiated heat.

qualities.name: Thermographic Vision
qualities.effect: Provides natural thermographic vision.

qualities.name: Toughness
qualities.effect: +1 Damage Resistance

qualities.name: Trustworthy (Skill Group)
qualities.effect: +1 Influence group

qualities.name: Type O System
qualities.effect: Off-the-rack, basic bioware is treated as delta grade for the character, reducing Essence Costs by half.

qualities.name: Underwater Vision
qualities.effect: Character possesses a specially-adapted membrane to the outer eye that enables them to use their normal vision unrestricted in and out of water.

qualities.name: Vomeronasal Organ
qualities.effect: Character possesses auxiliary olfactory organelles that augment the sense of smell, granting a higher sensitivity and contrast to body odors.

qualities.name: Water Sprite
qualities.effect: +2 Swimming

qualities.name: Webbed Hands and Toes
qualities.effect: +2 Swimming

qualities.name: Wild Card Nano Prototype
qualities.effect: A character is field testing a state-of-the-art hard nanite system that can be reprogrammed to perform as any internal nanoware system also at Rating 3.

qualities.name: Will to Live (Rating 1)
qualities.effect: Gains 1 additional Damage Overflow Box.

qualities.name: Will to Live (Rating 2)
qualities.effect: Gains 2 additional Damage Overflow Boxes.

qualities.name: Will to Live (Rating 3)
qualities.effect: Gains 3 additional Damage Overflow Boxes.

qualities.name: Addiction (Mild)
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Addiction (Moderate)
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Addiction (Severe)
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Addiction (Burnout)
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Adiposis
qualities.effect: -3 Dodge; -3 Physical Active skills; +-50% Movement

qualities.name: AIPS (Rating 1)
qualities.effect: Inflicts a -1 dice pool penalty to Perception Tests while within Signal range of a Matrix device due to a psychological disorder.

qualities.name: AIPS (Rating 2)
qualities.effect: Inflicts a -2 dice pool penalty to Perception Tests while within Signal range of a Matrix device due to a psychological disorder.

qualities.name: AIPS (Rating 3)
qualities.effect: Inflicts a -3 dice pool penalty to Perception Tests while within Signal range of a Matrix device due to a psychological disorder.

qualities.name: Albinism
qualities.effect: Character is photosensitive, suffering increased visibility modifiers from glare and treating sunlight as a Moderate Allergy.

qualities.name: Amnesia (Past)
qualities.effect: The character has lost some of their memory, potentially including skills and abilities from their past.

qualities.name: Amnesia (Everything)
qualities.effect: The character has lost all of their memory, including their identity, skills, and abilities.

qualities.name: Aspected Magician (Conjuror)
qualities.effect: -4 Sorcery; -4 Assensing; -4 Astral Combat; -4 Enchanting; -4 Arcana

qualities.name: Aspected Magician (Sorcerer)
qualities.effect: -4 Conjuring; -4 Assensing; -4 Astral Combat; -4 Enchanting; -4 Arcana

qualities.name: Aspected Magician (Spell Category)
qualities.effect: -4 Assensing; -4 Astral Combat; -4 Enchanting

qualities.name: Aspected Magician (Spirit)
qualities.effect: -4 Assensing; -4 Astral Combat; -4 Enchanting

qualities.name: Aspected Magician (Astral)
qualities.effect: -4 Sorcery; -4 Conjuring; -4 Enchanting; -4 Arcana

qualities.name: Aspected Magician (Enchanter)
qualities.effect: -4 Sorcery; -4 Assensing; -4 Astral Combat; -4 Conjuring

qualities.name: Assensing Rejection
qualities.effect: Character is incapable of consciously acknowledging the results of any Assensing Tests, though still generally aware of astral forms.

qualities.name: Asthma
qualities.effect: Character suffers from a permanent minor allergy to multiple common allergens and uses half their Body rating to determine the threshold before taking Fatigue damage from exertion.

qualities.name: Astral Beacon
qualities.effect: The astral signature of the character sticks out, lasting twice as long, and providing a +2 dice pool modifier to others assensing it.

qualities.name: Astral Hazing (non-Awakened)
qualities.effect: Character becomes an aspected domain that taints astral space around them, reducing Magic by the local background count.

qualities.name: Astral Hazing (Awakened)
qualities.effect: Character becomes an aspected domain that taints astral space around them, reducing Magic by the local background count and impairing their own magic.

qualities.name: Augmentation Addict
qualities.effect: The character suffers from a strong urge to seek out better and more interesting body modifications, acting like a Moderate drug addiction psychologically.

qualities.name: Bad Luck
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Bad Rep
qualities.effect: +3 Notoriety

qualities.name: Berserker
qualities.effect: Allows the character to voluntarily trigger a berserk state, gaining +1 to all Physical attributes but lowering all Mental attributes by 1.

qualities.name: Bi-Polar
qualities.effect: Character vacillates between manic activity (Physical attribute bonuses/Mental penalties) and bouts of depression (Mental/Physical penalties).

qualities.name: Big Regret
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Bioluminescence
qualities.effect: Causes the character to emit a glow that negates visibility modifiers in low light, but makes them easily visible and targetable.

qualities.name: Biosystem Overstress
qualities.effect: Leads to slower healing times and faster onset of fatigue from bioware implants, doubling the normal interval for Healing Tests and halving the base period before Fatigue sets in.

qualities.name: Borrowed Time
qualities.effect: Character is living on borrowed time due to a fatal condition and may die at any moment after a gamemaster-determined number of game months.

qualities.name: Cephalopoidal Skull
qualities.effect: Inflicts a ‚Äì3 dice pool modifier when resisting damage to the head/torso due to soft skull material.

qualities.name: Codeblock
qualities.effect: Character always has trouble with a particular Matrix action, receiving a -2 dice pool modifier anytime they attempt it.

qualities.name: Combat Paralysis
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Computer Illiterate
qualities.effect: Inflicts a -2 dice pool modifier to all tests that involve a computer, electronic device, or Matrix-connected system.

qualities.name: Corruptor
qualities.effect: AI suffers from the Gremlins quality at Rating 2, causing malfunctions in programs it interacts with.

qualities.name: Cranial Bomb
qualities.effect: Someone has planted an explosive device in the character's head. The gamemaster decides who planted it and what that person wants.

qualities.name: Critter Spook
qualities.effect: -2 Animal Husbandry group

qualities.name: Cyberpsychosis
qualities.effect: -2 Social Active skills

qualities.name: Cyclopean Eye
qualities.effect: Imposes a ‚Äì1 dice pool modifier for all Combat Tests and precision-based skill tests due to lacking binocular vision.

qualities.name: Elf Poser
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Extravagant Eyes
qualities.effect: Changes the character's eye color to an unusual shade, which has no direct game effect but may lead to negative social modifiers.

qualities.name: Feathers
qualities.effect: Causes the character to sprout feathers that offer no protective value and are incompatible with other hair/skin modifications.

qualities.name: Geas
qualities.effect: A restriction the Awakened character voluntarily imposes on his own magical power; if the restriction is broken, the character's Magic attribute is reduced by 1 point.

qualities.name: High-Maintenance Implant
qualities.effect: A specific cyberware implant suffers from an unfixable glitch that requires constant vigilance and maintenance to prevent it from failing and shutting down.

qualities.name: Impaired Attribute
qualities.effect: Attribute bonus (selected)

qualities.name: Implant-Induced Immune Deficiency
qualities.effect: Inflicts a ‚Äì2 dice pool modifier to all Body Tests to resist the effects of diseases, drugs, and toxins due to decreased immunity from implants.

qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety; Infirm: Physical attributes cost double

qualities.name: Insectoid Features
qualities.effect: Imposes social penalties and makes the character a primary target in combat due to possessing insect-like features.

qualities.name: Mood Hair
qualities.effect: Causes the character's hair to change colors according to their emotional state, imposing a +2 dice pool modifier for all Judge Intentions Tests against the character.

qualities.name: Mystery Mod Noise
qualities.effect: A specific implant emits an intermittent and subtle but annoying noise, applying a +2 dice pool modifier to any Hearing Perception Tests made against the character.

qualities.name: Nano Intolerance
qualities.effect: Nanoware systems degrade faster (1 rating point every 4 days) due to a hyper-sensitive immune system.

qualities.name: Neoteny
qualities.effect: Reduces the character's default Physical Condition Monitor due to retaining childlike physical traits, making them easily mistaken for children.

qualities.name: Nocturnal
qualities.effect: Reduces all Mental attributes by 1 during daylight hours due to an abnormal circadian rhythm.

qualities.name: Ork Poser
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Progeria
qualities.effect: Imposes a ‚Äì3 dice pool modifier to all Physical Tests due to accelerated aging and cardiovascular problems.

qualities.name: Scales
qualities.effect: Causes the character to have scaly skin that offers no protective value and is incompatible with other hair/skin modifications.

qualities.name: Scorched
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Scorched (Tech)
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Scent Glands
qualities.effect: Causes the character to produce a foul odor when stressed, imposing a ‚Äì2 dice pool modifier to all Social Tests when the odor is not masked.

qualities.name: Sensitive System
qualities.effect: Sensitive System: Double Essence cost for cyberware

qualities.name: SINner (Standard)
qualities.effect: Character was born with or acquired a legal System Identification Number (SIN), meaning their identity is stored and accessible in numerous databanks.

qualities.name: SINner (Criminal)
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Slow Healer
qualities.effect: Imposes a ‚Äì2 dice pool modifier to all Healing Tests made by or for the character.

qualities.name: Sensory Overload Syndrome
qualities.effect: Requires a Willpower (3) Test in a sensory-saturated environment to avoid suffering seizures and temporary incapacitation.

qualities.name: Spirit Bane
qualities.effect: +1 Notoriety

qualities.name: Striking Skin Pigmentation
qualities.effect: Causes unusual skin colors that are obvious and visible, making the character easier to notice and potentially subjecting her to prejudice.

qualities.name: Stubby Arms
qualities.effect: Reduces the reach of melee weapons by 1 and imposes a ‚Äì1 dice pool modifier for physical tests requiring dexterity with the arms.

qualities.name: Symbiosis
qualities.effect: Causes the character to become physically attuned to her permanent home, granting survival bonuses but potentially making her sick if the environment is polluted.

qualities.name: Temporal Lobe Epilepsy
qualities.effect: The character suffers from chronic degenerative temporal lobe epilepsy with complications, leading to acute epileptic seizures in stressful situations.

qualities.name: Third Eye
qualities.effect: Grants a third eye on the forehead that incurs no vision modifiers, but makes the character easily noticeable, subjecting them to social penalties.

qualities.effect: +1 Unarmed DV
